text: Tini tomadera jan'ya se'i dharma theke bidhana dicchena yara dbara tini nuhake nirdesa diyechilena, ara ya amara tomara kache pratyadesa karachi, ara yara dbara amara ibrahimake o musake o isake nirdesa diyechilama e'i bale -- ''dharmake kayema karo, ara ete eke-an'ye bicchinna hayo na.’’ Musarikadera jan'ya e bara kathina byapara yara prati tumi tadera ah‌bana karacha! Allah yake iccha karena take tamra karane nirbacita karena, ara tamra dike paricalita karena take ye phere.
